name: Fei Se
description: She's hard to pin down, but the moment you wish to see her, she gracefully appears.

set.set_2: After using any flame weapon skill or discharge, increase all attack by **14%**/**16%**/**18%**/**20%** for **3000** seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.set_4: When equipped with at least **1** flame weapon, increase all elemental damage by **14%**/**17%**/**20%**/**23%**. After creating Fei Se's Phantasia, additionally increase final damage by **9%** for **2500** seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
